title: Whoops Something Broke!
body: I was trying to play League today but when I clicked on the desktop Icon, it seemed normal with the words "League of Legends" popping up in the middle. But then suddenly it started spamming me with Whoops Something Broke! messages! Is there a fix to this? I've tried restarting my computer and have even re-installed League.

replies.body: having the same problem, any fixes...????

If reinstalling League wasn't able to help, there might be a few corrupted game files that aren't being properly fixed with that reinstall alone. Try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and make sure to run it with both **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall** turned on. Let me know if that's able to help or not!
I came across this issue today. I tried using the HextechRepairTool. But it didnt work. And im nit sure what I should put in the support ticket
